DOC.brief_summary: Intralipid infusion improve outcome NK cell positive female history recurrent miscarriage undergo IVF/ICSI cycle .
DOC.criteria: Couples unexplained secondary infertility Three prior consecutive clinical miscarriage either spontaneous pregnancy IVF/ICSI . Elevated natural killer ( NK ) cell CD16 , CD56 cell CD16/CD56 > 12 % . Age forty year old . Antiphospholipid syndrome ( lupus anticoagulant and/or anticardiolipin antibody [ IgG IgM ] ) ; recognise thrombophilic condition ( test accord usual clinic practice ) . Intrauterine abnormality ( assess ultrasound , hysterosonography , hysterosalpingogram , hysteroscopy ) . Abnormal parental karyotype . Other identifiable cause recurrent miscarriage ( test initiate clinically indicate ) e.g. , diabetes , thyroid disease systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) . Disturbances normal fat metabolism pathologic hyperlipemia Allergic ; egg , soybean oil , safflower oil . Severe liver disease , kidney disease , lung disease , anemia , blood clot disorder .
